txt.en: Scather-flies plague this part of Ambarûl's marshes. Slaying some scather-flies to diminish their population would be beneficial to the people of Ambarûl.
Scather-flies, the marsh-flies that infest Umûn Khab in Ambarûl, are both dangerous and numerous.
You should slay some scather-flies in Umûn Khab to diminish their population. Umûn Khab is a marsh on the southern banks of the Ikorbân River.
